name: City Gangster
description:
Realistic Gangster story.

Criminal gangs seized Los Angel in the early 90s. Crime rate in the city reached the highest level.
It was not easy for city newcomer Ken. Help him to maintain order again.

- More than 10 weapons
- Realistic gang wars
- More than 30 cars
- Drive all cars in the city freely
- Realistic city car driving
- Realistic traffic system
- Big city maps (San Andreas like enormous city)
- Various camera angles (Inner cam, Front cam, outer cam and more)
- Amazing 3D graphics
- More than 15 language support


You can reach us for any questions or problems on help@zuuks.com.
